articles.title: US Firm On Ties Despite India Abstaining From UN Vote On Ukraine-Russia - NDTV
articles.description: America has a relationship with India that stands on its own merit, the Joe Biden administration said today. US also said that the ties with India have not been impacted by the ongoing tension with Russia.
articles.content:
State Department spokesperson Ned Price made the remarks during his daily press conference

articles.title: Pep and Ackermans owner to buy Brazilian chain - News24
articles.description: Discount retailer Pepkor has breached the largest economy in South American, announcing on Thursday that it acquired a controlling stake in the Brazilian-based clothing retailer Grupo Avenida.
articles.content:
